vclaim: In October 2019, U.S. President Donald Trump called Italy's president 'Mozzarella' and claimed the U.S. and Italy had been allies for thousands of years.
title: Did Donald Trump Call Italy’s President ‘Mozzarella’?
subtitle: Critics of the president seized on two supposed gaffes in October 2019. But what did Trump actually say?
author: Dan MacGuill
